channel.title: grind on Pitch by Shun Kakinoki
channel.description: Recent content in grind on Pitch by Shun Kakinoki

item.title: 2-way Stream Grind
item.description: 2-way Stream Grind Mission Empower individuals to discover the joy of grind through a completely new interface Problem grind is not considered as important & cool as back in the day grind is not as effective as alone compared to when with others grind not as realistic online with others Solution Provide a 2-way grind interface for individuals to focus on their profession more Incentivize users to grind more through social challenges Other grind support is necessary in order to conduct your biggest challenge
item.content:encoded: 2-way Stream Grind Mission Empower individuals to discover the joy of grind through a completely new interface Problem grind is not considered as important &amp; cool as back in the day grind is not as effective as alone compared to when with others grind not as realistic online with others Solution Provide a 2-way grind interface for individuals to focus on their profession more Incentivize users to grind more through social challenges Other grind support is necessary in order to conduct your biggest challenge
